title.rendered: Joburg vs Pretoria, Australian T20 League, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Joburg: Janneman Malan, Reeza Hendricks, Faf du Plessis (c), Kyle Verreynne (wk), Leus du Plooy, Donavon Ferreira, Romario Shepherd, George Garton, Alzarri Joseph, Gerald Coetzee, Aaron Phangiso

Pretoria: Philip Salt (wk), Will Jacks, Rilee Rossouw, Theunis de Bruyn, Shane Dadswell, James Neesham, Wayne Parnell (c), Migael Pretorius, Eathan Bosch, Adil Rashid, Anrich Nortje

Venue: The Wanderers Stadium, Johannesburg

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 2 games)

1st innings average score: 164

2nd innings average score: 179

Wickets per innings: 6

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 100%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Faf du Plessis has collected 528 runs at 41, including the highest score of 119 at Wanderers.

From Joburg, Aaron Phangiso has played the most number of matches at Johannesburg. He has bagged 40 wickets including the best figures of 3 for 18.

Wayne Parnell has picked only 5 wickets in 8 games at Johannesburg but has the highest score of 99 with the bat. He is also the only player from Pretoria to feature in the Ultimate Team in both games this season.

Janneman Malan and Reeza Hendricks have been experiencing a rough time with the bat lately. While Malan’s tournament scores read 16, 2, and 5, Hendricks has been dismissed for a hat-trick of single-digit scores.

Will Jacks, Theunis de Bruyn, and Wayne Parnell have collectively blasted 16 sixes in 3 games. For Joburg, Donavon Ferreira alone has smashed 5 sixes.

While Pretoria’s top order has blown hot and cold, Johannesburg’s top three batters have failed miserably.
